document_data.name: Sisters of Cyric
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sisters of Cyric''' were a [[Thay]]an cavalry regiment active in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Every member was an [[evil]] [[priestess]] of [[Cyric]] who rode into battle on a [[black unicorn]].
document_data.Activities: The Sisters were prominent even among the already infamous black unicorn cavalry of Thay. They served [[Aznar Thrul]],
